name: Alice - Escape from Wonderland
description:
Alice - Escape from Wonderland is a game where you control Alice through a part of Wonderland trying to find things that help you escape. The game is a "Walk-and-Click" adventure.
If you want to walk around, you can use WASD (like in most games) or a joystick. The game has been developed for the Commodore 64 platform. If you don't own a C64, you can also play it via emulator in the browser. Or, event better, get yourself a Commodore C64!
